Five minute learningÂ¶

try pytraj online:

# load pytraj
In [1]: import pytraj as pt

# load amber netcdf file
In [2]: traj = pt.iterload('tz2.nc', 'tz2.parm7')

In [3]: traj
Out[3]: 
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 101 frames, include:
<Topology: 223 atoms, 13 residues, 1 mols, non-PBC>>
           

# perform analysis
In [4]: data = pt.molsurf(traj, mask='!@H=')

In [5]: data
Out[5]: 
array([ 1308.20650442,  1282.93883304,  1266.44646555, ...,  1168.2443778 ,
        1178.70291104,  1180.73997721])

# plotting
# write to disk in DCD format
In [6]: pt.write_traj('charmming.dcd', traj, overwrite=True)

In [7]: from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

In [8]: plt.plot(data, '--bo')
Out[8]: [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x2aaac7b68fd0>]
